reviews.review: A very solid film visually and Brolin as Thanos was intriguing, but the MCU cliches were riddled throughout the 160 min film. Constant forced humor in terrible places that didn’t work, and same old fight scenes overdone to a gratuitous point. A lot of convenient plotting with an end that seems like a cop out cliffhanger. Also they turned hulk into a complete inferior useless member of the avenger team and to me that’s blasphemy.Overall a massively fun ride due to amazing visuals and action but quite overhyped and overrated.
A fantastic movie. A really epic adaptation of a beloved Comic Series. I can see Thanos as an Anti-hero more than a villain.
Well done , one of the best Marvel movies so far and i am huge DC fan but they kill with this movie.Still dont like this one liner jokes but overall is damn good , a lot of action , good story + fun.

How they brought all the characters together and stayed true to the characters is phenomenal. Maybe Lucas Film could learn from this. 19 films and they stayed true to the Marvel Universe. This is definitely a transition film and a reward if you are up to date in the Marvel Universe.

Successfully balancing its very large cast, Infinity War brings them all together for a thrill ride that will make you laugh and cry. The acting is great across the board, and the action is high-stakes, fun, and intense. Josh Brolin steals the show as Thanos, making the villain relatable but not quite likable; a difficult task he almost makes look easy. The visuals are dazzling, the musical score is phenomenal, and the story never feels slow despite the movie's 2.5 hour runtime. It does underuse a few characters, but this doesn't hamper the film's quality. Overall, Infinity War may not have exceeded expectations, but it definitely met them.
OMG best Marvel Movie so far, I loved it!
Amazing movie 10/10,Josh Brolin did a fantastic job as Thanos I thought
the movie is very good, although the run time is 2 hours and 40 minutes there is so much going on it was very good! Would recommend!!
